title: Anyone else annoyed when Yasuos / Irelias dash?
body:
Specifically when they spam dash onto minions. Just gives off a vibe of "Damn I'm so cool, look at my mobility and coolness as I dash everywhere." Doesn't look cool imo, just annoying.

Just wondering if anyone else gets annoyed by that.

replies.body: Everything about {{champion:157}} is annoying not just his dash. His double passive, stupid windwall, insane lifesteal, undodgeable tornado with huge hitbox and ultimate with almost no cooldown.

Not to mention that his ulti is _insanely_ forgiving.  You can basically wait until they're back on the ground to use it, and if they're under turret it'll automatically place you outside of turret range.
Not just turrets it'll place you outside of either, it'll place you outside of Viktors Gravity Well for instance.

> [{quoted}](name=Bob the Toastr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MOkvJGZG,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2019-03-30T19:04:08.695+0000)
>
> Not to mention that his ulti is _insanely_ forgiving.  You can basically wait until they're back on the ground to use it, and if they're under turret it'll automatically place you outside of turret range.

Makes me wonder why Yasuo can't be hit during his ult.....yet J4 can be hit/killed during his leap. Is it because of how long Yasuo's "hang time" is?

Yep. It's the delay.

J4's R is practically instant. It's...what? A quarter second? Not very significant. Yasuo's is at least a full second.
and don't forget he can do it off ANY knockup, like {{champion:54}} ult, or even when the baron knocks up someones ( I think), or even some tiny displacement, like {{champion:122}} E.
YEAH i hate that tower safety so much, like in[ this clip ](https://twitter.com/nekoabuki/status/993049015573860355)it even places him behind a wall while ulting
Yasuo seriously needs to be looked at right now, the champ is unbelievably stupid to play against, not just his free flash on minions being the problem
How about add riven on that, since she's a r%%%%% proof champion with several dashes that dont require targets.
They need to simplify him like they did Akali and Irelia, he can stay like this for years but they had a lot removed/reworked since their reworks.
as a morde and urgot player, yes, its annoying

and then u hear 
HASAGI
HASAGI 
WASAGI

every dam second
This is why I play Malzahar. Everyone says Malz is so boring but it's so godamn satisfying to just deny some champions from dashing around the joint like a rabbit on coke.
The thing that pisses me off is the sound effects attached to them.  I don't even hate fighting the characters so much as the noise pollution that plagues the lane for around 15-20 minutes.
Anyone else get annoyed when champions dash in general? Fuck mobility creep

In my opinion having one dash to get in is fine. Assassins may also have an additional dash to get out on a long cooldown and if they decide to use it mid-fight to try and confirm a kill that’s on them. They must deal with the concequnces. Champions that can dash 2 or more times within the fight itself are a problem.
I think Irelia'a dash speed should be slowed down. Her dash is more than instant. Yasuo's is a bit slower which is nice.

It's so instant that it literally went clean through an in flight J4 EQ combo in LCK. It also puts you directly behind your enemy, which is why I have to ban Irelia any time I want to play {{champion:14}}

> [{quoted}](name=oortoomeebreesuu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MOkvJGZG,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2019-03-30T18:35:42.984+0000)
>
> It's so instant that it literally went clean through an in flight J4 EQ combo in LCK. It also puts you directly behind your enemy, which is why I have to ban Irelia any time I want to play {{champion:14}}

All targeted dashes do this. Like Diana's. Though it isn't as special due to the long cd w/o a reset.
Diana’s dash only put you behind them if you are within a specific distance from them.

That actually sounds like a good idea and if that doesn't work I think she should have a small delay if she kills a minion (but cd still resets) with her q kind of like maybe roughly yasuo's e delay that way people can react better to her dashes.
I am quite annoyed, so I pick {{champion:78}} into them every chance I get and even though it means I lose lane and probably the game it is still worth it to stop their smug dashes every time

> [{quoted}](name=Minimac2000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MOkvJGZG,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-03-30T16:28:45.412+0000)
>
> I am quite annoyed, so I pick {{champion:78}} into them every chance I get and even though it means I lose lane and probably the game it is still worth it to stop their smug dashes every time

Lol just smash into a wall out of spite? I like it.

Uh Poppy stomps dude. She is hella busted. Just sit back and let farm come to you as best you can. Stock up on pots and whittle them down with a coin and grasp stacks. Then hit a stun and w so they cant get away from you q. Ta da lane won
You had me at "annoyed when Yasuo"
Yes I love when I'm escaping, Yasuo just dashes through my team's minion wave without any cooldown on his dash, very "cool" if you ask me...

I get annoyed by Yas, but I never had a problem with Irelia, even the old "I dash and insta-stun you" kit. At least she has to get some items until she can reliably reset her dash while this manaless guy can spam it all day long.

Irelia has an excuse for using a Q on minions, it's one of her main ways of getting cs since it's one of her main damage tools, and she has a limit to it if she fails to kill the minion, or fail to kill anything for that matter (considering only champions can be marked by her ult and e) it puts the q on a cooldown.
Yasuo on the other hand has a cooldown per target with his e, thank god, but his e has barely any cooldown whatsoever, and it increases in damage the more he keeps dashing, and by the fact he can use his e with his q for a target knockup if possible, is very annoying.
there's no excuse for either one of these, stop kidding yourself.
when the heck did I say yasuo has an excuse
you think those are annoying? What about Riven?

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MOkvJGZG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-30T15:31:39.009+0000)
>
> you think those are annoying? What about Riven?

Riven has a single dash and 2 little inch forward moves and a knock up flip. Not the same as dashing to 8 different minions.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MOkvJGZG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-30T15:31:39.009+0000)
>
> you think those are annoying? What about Riven?

Well she doesn't really dash like Yasuo or Irelia, but she does hop around and does a baby dash, then skull fucks your face.

"a baby dash" a baby dash with a less than 4 second cd and a shield that persists for half the cooldown that scales 1 to 1 with your bonus ad.
If she was hopping, i'd be seeing her jump up on every q in place, instead she short lunges forward on every q then jumps and slams the sword into the ground to do the knockup on q3. Both Yas and Irelia require the target being in the cast radius.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MOkvJGZG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-30T15:31:39.009+0000)
>
> you think those are annoying? What about Riven?

Yeah she's annoying as well but for some reason she doesn't grind my gears like watching Irelia's and Yasuo's spam dash everywhere. I think it's more of her shield that bothers me as opposed to spam dashing like the other two.
Idk, when you go against a Riven with 45% cdr, if you dont have any point click lockdown, you'll never catch her.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MOkvJGZG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-30T15:31:39.009+0000)
>
> you think those are annoying? What about Riven?

but rivin has ti timer all her dashes so she doesnt have all 3 on cd at the sime time rel and yasuo can permi spam theirs and with cd

Oh boo hoo, timing. Like that makes any difference from her killing your ass in a second because she needs a execute on a already strong ultimate. Also, not like she has 45% cdr, so those "long cooldowns" are gonna be back up in mere seconds. If she isn't as strong as irelia and yasuo, then why the hell is she one of the best toplaners in the current moment? Oh thats right, her counters got nerfed and her kit breaks DD and Conq.

> [{quoted}](name=Akrid415,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MOkvJGZG,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-30T14:31:46.655+0000)
>
> Specifically when they spam dash onto minions. Just gives off a vibe of "Damn I'm so cool, look at my mobility and coolness as I dash everywhere." Doesn't look cool imo, just annoying.
> 
> Just wondering if anyone else gets annoyed by that.

Yeah uhm just saying as a irelia main i would say we do it maybe 20% of the time to,show off the other 80% its just to speed farm minions
Honestly, all characters with more than 1 dash they can perform per fight annoys me.  Though yes, Irelia and Yasuo are fairly high on the list of annoying dashing bastards.

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Dienekes,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MOkvJGZG,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2019-03-30T19:31:12.035+0000)
>
> Honestly, all characters with more than 1 dash they can perform per fight annoys me.  Though yes, Irelia and Yasuo are fairly high on the list of annoying dashing bastards.

Seriously, this. Vayne and kalista are ok because their dashes are really short ranged. She is is ok because its her ult. These two, irelia and yasuo (and katarina /LeBlanc) are just way out of line with the others.

I'm the one who annoys Yasuo.  I just pick {{champion:111}}  into him and no more dashy dashy after right clicking him.  After he can go zoom zoom again I press E and he eats all 3 hits from riptide.  Once I hit 6 I just casually click R on him and there is nothing he can do about it.  No amount of dashes or windwalls can protect him from the inevitable.

> [{quoted}](name=Akrid415,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MOkvJGZG,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-30T14:31:46.655+0000)
>
> Specifically when they spam dash onto minions. Just gives off a vibe of "Damn I'm so cool, look at my mobility and coolness as I dash everywhere." Doesn't look cool imo, just annoying.
> 
> Just wondering if anyone else gets annoyed by that.

Every fucking time. While I stand there walking back and forth waiting for them to finish because they'll just pop {{item:2033}} and all in me at level 2 and halve my hp with two abilities if I even try to last hit. You keep expecting there to be a cooldown on the abilities they are spamming, you keep waiting for an opening to farm, or trade, but there never fucking is one.

Same

Literally I feel the same

I'm annoyed by the fact that Irelia's dash is the free-est damn waveclear/easy early farm of any champ in the history of league. 

Does a champ like that really need to be insanely easy for low elo players to ALSO get the most farm in the entire match for literally 0 effort whatsoever as well?  Cus this game needs more obnoxious pubstomp champs right?

In my opinion Irelia is the worst because of her bullshit W. That shit does damage, mitigates damage and you cannot cancel (0 counterplay) 
 Yasuo is fine, if you have CC you are able to stop him
Shhhh everything is okay with Yas, LOL needs an easy mode champ for the 10yr olds.
Irelia Q applies Sheen and Phage too, so she gets 60 MS for just killing a minion with Q. Pretty busted
{{champion:78}}
Yes, they are annoying that's why I mained {{champion:163}} to shit on their constant dashes but that's no longer a champion sadly.
